snippet: The bombs killed at least 23 people, including a family trapped in a burning car, activists said.
abstract: Syrian military helicopters drop barrels packed with bombs on city of Aleppo, killing at least 23 people; car bomb near gas station in Lebanon is linked to Syrian war.
lead_paragraph: The bombs killed at least 23 people, including a family trapped in a burning car, activists said.

headline.main: Syrian Helicopters Drop Barrel Bombs on Aleppo
headline.print_headline: Syrian Helicopters Drop Barrel Bombs on Aleppo
